Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some 95th-bound Red Line trains are operating with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
